structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.catch_line: Possession of anhydrous ammonia in unapproved container prohibited -- Exceptions -- Affirmative defense.

text.section: It shall be unlawful for any person to knowingly possess anhydrous ammonia in any container other than an approved container.
The provisions of this section shall not apply to trained chemists working in properly equipped research laboratories in education, government, or corporate settings.
It shall be an affirmative defense to prosecution under this section that the anhydrous ammonia is possessed for the sole purpose of agricultural use.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000.
